description.value:
Aura 4

Enemies treat all squares within the aura as difficult terrain.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+28 vs AC; 3d8+6 damage, and if the target is wearing magic armor, the armor starts decaying; the wearer takes a -1 penalty to AC until the end of encounter. This penalty is cumulative, to a maximum -5.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Ranged 5

+27 vs Reflex; 2d12+6 psychic damage, and if the target is wearing magic armor, the armor starts decaying; the wearer takes a -1 penalty to AC until the end of encounter. This penalty is cumulative, to a maximum -5.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Reliable

Minor 1/Turn, Recharge

Targets a creature wearing or wielding a decaying magic item of 30th level or lower

+28 vs. Reflex; the decaying magic item is destroyed.

At-Will

Standard

The rust monster nightmare shifts 4 squares by leaping and makes four melee or ranged basic attacks.

Recharge 5-6

Standard

Ranged 10

+26 vs Fortitude; 3d12+6 damage, and the target is stunned (save ends). First Failed Saving Throw: The target is unconscious (save ends). The rust monster nightmare causes the magical possession of the target to exude painful vibrations.

Standard, Recharge When First Bloodied

Close blast 5

Trigger: When first bloodied

+26 vs Will; 2d12+6 psychic damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of the rust monster nightmare's next turn. Miss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of the rust monster nightmare's next turn.

At-Will

Immediate Interrupt

Targets the triggering creature

Trigger: When an enemy teleports into or out of a square adjacent to the rust monster nightmare

+27 vs. Will; the teleport fails and the rust monster gains 20 temporary hit points.

At-Will

Trigger: When the rust monster nightmare is hit by an attack that uses a magic implement or weapon

The implement or weapon used in the triggering attack begins decaying; the wielder of the weapon takes a -1 penalty to damage rolls with that weapon until the end of the encounter. This penalty is cumulative, to a maximum of -5.

A rust monster nightmare consumes any item it destroys. The residuum from any magic items the creature has destroyed can be retrieved from its stomach. The residuum is worth the market value of the item (not one-fifth the value).

Languages (telepathy)
Alignment Unaligned
Senses Blindsight 20
Passive Perception 26 | Insight 26
